faqs.question: Do you use original parts?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use only genuine and high-quality parts for all repairs.

faqs.question: How long does a typical repair take?
faqs.answer: Most repairs are completed within 1-2 hours.

faqs.question: Is there a warranty on repairs?
faqs.answer: Yes, all repairs come with a 90-day warranty.

faqs.question: Can I get service at home?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer doorstep service for most repairs.

faqs.question: What if my laptop can't be repaired?
faqs.answer: If we can't fix it, you won't be charged for the repair.

faqs.question: Will my data be safe during repair?
faqs.answer: We take utmost care to protect your data. Please back up important files if possible.

faqs.question: Can I get a cost estimate before repair?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide a detailed estimate after diagnosis and before starting any work.

faqs.question: Do you offer cleaning as part of repair?
faqs.answer: Yes, basic cleaning is included with most repairs. Deep cleaning is available as an add-on.

faqs.question: Do you offer emergency or same-day repairs?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer express and same-day repair options for urgent cases.

faqs.question: Can I bring my own parts?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can provide your own components for assembly.

faqs.question: Do you offer warranty on assembly?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 6-month warranty on all assembly work.

faqs.question: How long does assembly take?
faqs.answer: Most PC assemblies are completed within 2-3 hours.

faqs.question: Do you provide cable management?
faqs.answer: Yes, professional cable management is included in all builds.

faqs.question: Can you install the operating system?
faqs.answer: Yes, OS installation is available as an add-on.

faqs.question: Do you check compatibility of all parts?
faqs.answer: Yes, we check all components for compatibility before assembly.

faqs.question: Can you help with overclocking?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer safe overclocking as an optional service.

faqs.question: Is there support after assembly?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide post-assembly support for setup and troubleshooting.

faqs.question: Do you offer pickup and delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer free pickup and delivery for PC assembly services.

faqs.question: Will my data be safe?
faqs.answer: Yes, we take utmost care to protect your data during virus removal.

faqs.question: Do you install antivirus software?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can install and configure antivirus as part of the service.

faqs.question: How long does virus removal take?
faqs.answer: Most removals are completed within 1-2 hours.

faqs.question: Can you remove ransomware?
faqs.answer: We attempt to remove all types of malware, including ransomware.

faqs.question: Will my computer be faster after service?
faqs.answer: We optimize your system as part of the service.

faqs.question: What types of viruses can you remove?
faqs.answer: We remove viruses, malware, spyware, adware, and more.

faqs.question: Is there a risk of data loss?
faqs.answer: We do our best to avoid data loss, but recommend backing up important files.

faqs.question: Do you provide tips to prevent future infections?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide advice and best practices to keep your system safe.

faqs.question: Is follow-up support available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer free follow-up checks after service if needed.

faqs.question: Are there any hidden costs?
faqs.answer: No, all costs are explained up front before we begin.

4.name: Data Recovery
4.description: Recover lost or deleted files from hard drives, SSDs, and USB drives.

superSaverPacks.name: Data Saver Pack
superSaverPacks.title: Annual Data Recovery
superSaverPacks.description: 2 recoveries + free diagnosis + priority support

superSaverPacks.name: Data Premium Pack
superSaverPacks.title: Premium Data Recovery
superSaverPacks.description: Unlimited data recovery + 24/7 support + free pickup/drop

superSaverPacks.name: Express Data Recovery
superSaverPacks.title: Same-day Data Recovery
superSaverPacks.description: Fast data recovery with free pickup and delivery.

categories.name: Basic Recovery
categories.description: Recovery of recently deleted files.

categories.name: Advanced Recovery
categories.description: Recovery from formatted or corrupted drives.

faqs.question: Is data recovery guaranteed?
faqs.answer: We offer a 'no data, no charge' policy for all recovery jobs.

faqs.question: How long does recovery take?
faqs.answer: Basic recovery is usually done in 2 hours; advanced cases may take longer.

faqs.question: Can you recover data from a dead laptop?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can attempt recovery from most devices, even if not powering on.

faqs.question: Is my data kept confidential?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, we follow strict confidentiality protocols.

faqs.question: What types of files can you recover?
faqs.answer: We can recover documents, photos, videos, and more.

faqs.question: Can you recover data from external drives or USBs?
faqs.answer: Yes, we support all types of storage devices.

faqs.question: What if my drive is physically damaged?
faqs.answer: We can attempt recovery from physically damaged drives, but success rates vary.

faqs.question: Do you provide a report of recovered files?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide a detailed report of all recovered data.

faqs.question: Is there a risk of further damage during recovery?
faqs.answer: We use safe, professional tools to minimize any risk.
